long_description: Relaxed like your favorite sweatpants but built with performance fabric, the Nike Tight Knit Track pants offer total comfort for pre-race warm-ups, cool-weather jogs or enjoying your post-run coffee. Dri-FIT(R) polyester jersey fabric wicks sweat and dries quickly; back-of-knee panels enhance ventilation. Elastic drawcord waist with internal drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Reflective leg zips at cuffs boost visibility in low light and make it easier to put pants on over shoes. Stash a packet of energy gel or your debit card in the zippered lumbar pocket. The Nike Tight Knit Track pants are semifitted.
short_description: Relaxed like your favorite sweatpants but built with performance fabric, the Nike Tight Knit Track pants offer total comfort for pre-race warm-ups, cool-weather jogs or enjoying your post-run coffee.
